attributes.action: The people of the UK call for an immediate second referendum on EU membership
attributes.additional_details: We were misled about the impact of a leave vote. We didn’t vote for the break-up of the UK. We didn’t vote for economic meltdown. Concerns of people across the UK have to be taken much more seriously – and now. But not this way. Give the UK another chance to vote in a referendum on EU membership.
attributes.background: The people of the UK were gravely misled. Nigel Farage admits the Leave campaign misled voters on a key campaigning message: extra money for the NHS. Claims by the Leave campaign that warnings about economic impacts were just “scaremongering” have already been proved catastrophically wrong.
